configenum.name: backend_list
configenum.desc: Should we display a list of backends (defined in config/backends.php) for users to choose from? If 'hidden', then you can use the 'preferred' mechanism in backends.local.php to auto-select based on an HTTP virtualhost or another piece of data. If 'shown', the user will be able to pick from any of the options.
